comments.author: Michael Becke
comments.body:
Attached is the code submitted by Chris Brown plus some mods.  Please take a
look and let me know.

comments.author: Michael Becke
comments.body:
I just noticed that this broke a test case for Netscape spec cookies.  I guess
the Netscape spec should not be using the DateParser. Please ignore that change.

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Looks good to me. Just leave the Netscape spec be. It is provided for
historically inclined, so it should continue using its own date parsing routine. 

Oleg

description:
Add generally accessible support for parsing HTTP dates as used in headers/cookies.

Initially submitted to HttpClient dev by Chris Brown.
